Name: The Bernard Zakheim Murals: History of Medicine in California
About the game: UC San Francisco is pleased to present this virtual experience for viewing a collection of New Deal-era murals by the Polish-born artist Bernard Zakheim. The collection features a 10-panel mural titled the 'History of Medicine,' which was carefully removed from a seismically outdated building and placed in safe, climate-controlled storage.
